description: This course will cover the theory of ancient Greek verse forms, the relation between traditional Homeric metrics and formulaic analysis, the development and use of specific metrical systems by post-Homeric poets, and the use of meter in Greek verse to create literary and dramatic effects. Work for the course will include the reading and scansion of a substantial body of ancient Greek verse in class; the grade will be based on classwork and a final paper.
name: GREEK METER
